text: Nick, Joe, Kevin, Danielle, Frankie, and Sophie seemed to have a blast. Instagram / Nick Jonas Although Joe Jonas and Sophie Turner have kept their relationship pretty low - key — even announcing their recent engagement with a simple Instagram — they weren't shy about documenting their love over the past few days. The couple celebrated their recent engagement over the weekend at Mamo restaurant in New York City. Based on Snapchats of the event, it looks like friends and family danced the night away and toasted to the couple. The party also featured a photobooth, and guests took advantage of the opportunity to capture the fun. ( Editor's note : click through the Instagram posts for additional photos. ) Joe's brothers and former band - mates, Nick and Kevin, were there,
